name: bootstrap
description: The universal normalize and grid system for developing responsive web.
author: Chikara Chan

scripts.jscs: jscs --config=js/.jscsrc js/src js/tests/unit docs/assets/js/src grunt Gruntfile.js docs/assets/js/ie-emulation-modes-warning.js docs/assets/js/ie10-viewport-bug-workaround.js
scripts.postcss-docs: postcss --config grunt/postcss.js --no-map --replace docs/assets/css/docs.min.css && postcss --config grunt/postcss.js --no-map --replace docs/examples/**/*.css
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run jscs && grunt test
